meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Valerie Connors Joe Di Dio Lisa Schlitt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7456.

td.p: Valerie Connors, a relationship marketing specialist and stay-at-home mom from Owings Mills, Maryland
Joe Di Dio, a daylight engineer and stay-at-home dad from Queens, New York
Lisa Schlitt, a microbiologist from Berwyn, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,600)

tr.td: ROUTE '60-SOMETHING
NOVEL VOCABULARY
YES, MR. MOVIE PRESIDENT
7 LETTERS, ONLY ONE VOWEL
ICE CREAM
CONES
